desc: We've been supplying the finest collection of furniture from our beautiful 17th century studio's in the Cotswolds. We believe in quality not quantity, sourcing rare & unique mid century and decorative antique furniture, whether its 18th Century French Armoires or Mid Century Danish Credenzas we try to source the best.

layout.text: The finest, inspirational collection of furniture from around the world. We believe in quality not quantity, sourcing rare & unique mid century and decorative antique furniture.
